mapper.select: SELECT u."id" , u.first_name as "firstName" , u.last_name as "lastName" , u.user_name as "userName" , u.date_birth as "dateBirth" , u.gender , u.resource_id as "resourceID" , u.phone_number as "phoneNumber" , u.other_phone_number as "otherPhoneNumber" FROM user_ u WHERE u.user_name = #{userName};
